    Reference

    All functions

    alpha_diversity()

    Title Wrapper function to analyse alpha diversity.

    beta_dispersion()

    Make an unconstrained analysis of beta diversity.

    beta_diversity()

    Plot beta-diversity with numerous aspect.

    calculate_variance()

    Calculate the variance for each factors.

    check_length()

    Check the length of reads in fastq.

    circular_variance_plot()

    Make circular plots for variance analysis.

    clean_sra_metadata()

    Title

    collapse_IgAseq()

    Collapse IgASeq

    constrained_beta_dispersion()

    Make a constrained analysis of beta diversity.

    cross_validate_data()

    Cross validate the training data.

    dereplicate()

    Dereplicate sequences in a dada2 manner

    differential_abundance()

    Title Find differential abundance within a dataset.

    ellipse_me()

    Title

    error_check()

    Error estimation according to dada2

    Title

    find_primer()

    Title

    FoldChangeClass-class fold

    Create a S4 object for the IgASeq data

    fold_change()

    Calculate fold change and p.value for your data.

    IgASeq-class ig_seq

    Create a S4 object for the IgASeq data

    list_fastq()

    Make the list of fastq files for the rest of the proceedings.

    log_ratio()

    Preprocess relative abundance.

    merge_and_remove_chim()

    Merge reads and remove chimera

    ml-class ml

    Create a S4 object for the machine learning results.

    neg_dispersion()

    Check the dispersion of your samples and the impact of the zero_treatment.

    phylo_heatmap()

    A function to plot heatmap nicely, using a phylogenetic distance.

    plot_all_variance()

    Plot the overall variance of your dataset

    plot_constrained_reduction()

    Make a constrained reduction on matrices and data.frame.

    plot_corr_heatmap()

    Plot a correlation heatmap

    plot_distribution()

    Plot the distribution of your data.

    plot_loadings()

    Title

    plot_plsda()

    Plot PLS-DA using mixOmics plsda

    plot_qual()

    Check the length of your reads.

    plot_reduction()

    Use multidimensional reduction on matrices and data.frame.

    plot_volcano()

    Plot volcano

    plot_xy_variance()

    Plot the variance for two factors.

    predict_models()

    Predict the classification based on the model training.

    qc_check()

    A wrapper function to plot the quality of fastq.

    rng_fastq()

    Randomly select fastq files

    screen_models()

    Title Screen a model on all your variables.

    select_fastq()

    Select the fastq in the directory you want.

    seq_table()

    IgASeq table

    slide_z()

    Analyse the ratio between your IgA positive fraction and the two IgA negative fractions.

    slide_z_modern()

    Modern version of the Z test on the IgASeq data.

    summarise_fastq()

    A function to summarise the fastq from a run.

    ternary_plot()

    Plot fold change or abundance as a ternary plot
